question:
Examine the video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1htKBjuUWec.

What does Teal'c say in response to the question "Isn't that hot?"

trajectory.question:

tool_executed.name: web_search
tool_executed.result:
Found 3 relevant web results:

1. Hear me out... Best Teal'c moment in the show? : r/Stargate
   URL: https://www.reddit.com/r/Stargate/comments/1ld1g7n/hear_me_out_best_tealc_moment_in_the_show/
   Site: reddit.com
   Date: 5 months ago
   Summary: https://youtu.be/1htKBjuUWec?si=l5ZcfHpLIaBZv3kx. Upvote 22. Downvote ... r/Stargate - Isn't that hot? 599 upvotes · 41 comments. Today's out ...

2. What is the funniest scene in the entire series.
   URL: https://www.facebook.com/groups/stargatefansunited/posts/10162067968523713/
   Site: facebook.com
   Date: 1 year ago
   Summary: ... Teal'c who's drinking coffee straight from the pot: "Isn't that hot ?". .. "Extremely !" https://youtu. be/1htKBjuUWec?feature=shared.

3. How I wish I could drink Coffee every morning. - GIF
   URL: https://imgur.com/gallery/how-i-wish-i-could-drink-coffee-every-morning-NcIdK7b
   Site: imgur.com
   Date: Nov 29, 2017
   Summary: "Isn't that hot?" asked Jack. His thirst for coffe sated Teal'c replied "Extremely". 14. Collapse replies

trajectory.actor_reasoning:
The quote is a well-known Stargate SG-1 moment where Teal'c drinks coffee straight from the pot; he replies with a single word.

FINAL ANSWER: Extremely
